channel.title: Klee sequencer for Axoloti
channel.description:
Hey :)
Have been eye balling this baby lately, a klee sequencer: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=l8Gtgc1v5H8
Its a sequencer based on some shift register vodoo. It seems very cool. There is a version for VCV rack that one could be inspired from :)
Did anyone code/patch one for Axoloti? I couldnt find anything in the community library.
Have a nice day!
